hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:The Prophet (ﷺ) decreed that one should not eat two dates together at a time unless he gets the permission from his companions (sharing the meal with him)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَانِ فِي التَّمْرِ بَيْنَ الشُّرَكَاءِ حَتَّى يَسْتَأْذِنَ أَصْحَابَهُ
chapter.eng-name: A partner should not eat two dates at a time
